subject: Horse Racing
Rachel Alexandra (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: The N.Y.R.A. said it wanted a corporate sponsor and air time on ESPN to make the Beldame Stakes a much-coveted showdown between Rachel Alexandra and the undefeated Zenyatta.
snippet: The N.Y.R.A. said it wanted a corporate sponsor and air time on ESPN to make the Beldame Stakes a much-coveted showdown between Rachel Alexandra and the undefeated Zenyatta.
